place.name: WENVOE
place.gazetteerText: WENVOE, or Wenfoe, a parish in Cardiff district, Glamorgan; 5½ miles SW of Cardiff r. station. It has a post-office under Cardiff. Acres, 2,955. Real property, £2,997; of which £200 are in mines. Pop., 504. Houses, 102. W. House was built, by the Thomas family, on the site of an old castle; has a frontage of 374 feet; and is the seat of R. Jenner, Esq. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Llandaff. Value, £363.* Patron, R. Jenner, Esq. Charities, £6. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
